review: I wasn't sure what I'd be getting for $35, but I am enjoying this device very much.  Easy to use - lots of content available - even music from my Amazon Prime - and Netflix - and Amazon's own original programming.  Working my way through Alpha House right now - finished season one - great comedy - on Amazon Prime.  My son visited recently and was amazed at how much better and easier to use this Fire Stick is than Google Chromecast.  Was a very well spent $35.
author: Dudley

review: It was easy to set up! I love it. I plan to purchase another.
author: Pamela Allen

review: Good concept but seems like all the shows and movies cost money.
author: Shawn McGarvin

review: Awesome..we have one in every room.
author: Jacqueline Garcia

review: Could not access ESPN using the fire stick. I was not aware you had to have a subscription in order to view for free. That was the intention of purchasing the stick, so I can access channels that I cannot through DISH.
author: Roy Abeyta

review: I was afraid it would be more difficult to use but it is so easy. Finally I can watch Amazon Prime on the big screen. Though I do watch on my smartphone and my Kindle HD depending on the situation.
author: Diana
